name: ThunderTron
description:
Warning: Bright flashes

Recommended: Full screen

Suggestion: Combine with pixel fireplace

Tip: Sit back and relax

Notice: The storm moves and changes intensity over time

Disclaimer: In case you were wondering about the 1 bit jam rule "NO AUDIO", it clearly says: "the game cannot use any audio which provides additional feedback to the player", but since there is no gameplay, there is no feedback

made by @Nothke for #bitJam 2016

Converted to HTML5/js January 2017
